text: Miguel Loinaz Balda (born 28 March 1967) is a retired Spanish football striker.Interview with Mundo Deportivo ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers Category:Basque footballers Category:Real Sociedad B footballers Category:Real Sociedad footballers Category:Villarreal CF players Category:SD Eibar footballers Category:Leça F.C. players Category:CE Sabadell FC footballers Category:Ontinyent CF players Category:SCR Peña Deportiva players Category:Association football forwards Category:La Liga players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Portugal
title: Miguel Loinaz
